A.name: Назва продукту
A.description: Sentences that contain the product name or its marketing name, possibly with language markers (e.g. '(UA)', '(RO)').

B.name: Алергенна фраза
B.description: Sentences that explicitly list possible allergens or state that the product may contain certain allergens.

C.name: Умови зберігання
C.description: Sentences that describe storage instructions, including temperature, humidity and preservation conditions.

D.name: Склад / інгредієнти
D.description: Sentences that list ingredients or composition of the product.

E.name: Контакти
E.description: Sentences that contain contact information such as company name, address, phone, email or website.

Z.name: Невідомо
Z.description: Unclassified or ambiguous text that does not clearly fit any of the other categories.
